import React, { Component } from 'react' import SearchTop from '../components/SearchTop'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Tab from 'react-bootstrap/Tab'; import TabContainer from 'react-bootstrap/TabContainer'; import TabContent from 'react-bootstrap/TabContent'; import TabPane from 'react-bootstrap/TabPane'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Toggle from '../components/Toggle'; export default class OrderExplorer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { purchaseList: [], activeSubtable: "" }; } componentWillMount() { const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({}) }; fetch("http://localhost:9000/api/purchases", requestOptions) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => { this.setState({purchaseList: res}); }); } render() { const toggleSubtable = (element) => { this.setState({activeSubtable: element}); } const updateStatus = (userId, companyId, userActive) => { const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({id: userId, active: userActive}) }; fetch("http://localhost:9000/api/changeStatus", requestOptions) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => { this.setState({purchaseList: res}); }); } return ( <>
New Order Past Order
Name Brand Delivery Address Personal Info Rental Info Status {this.state.purchaseList.map((row, i) =>
{row.customer_name} {row.brand_name_dba} {row.address} {toggleSubtable("personalInfo"+i)}}>View {toggleSubtable("rentalInfo"+i)}}>View {toggleSubtable("status"+i)}}>View
Delivery Method Email Address Phone Number
{row.delivery_method} {row.email} {row.phone}
Product SKU Quantity Color Size Rental Duration Rental Price
{} {} {} {} {} {}
Tracking Number Shipping Status Rental Status
{row.tracking_code} {(row.tracking_code == "")?"Not Shipped":"Shipped"} {(row.shiped == 1)?"Active":"Inactive"} ( {updateStatus(row.id, row.company_id, (row.shiped == 1)?0:1);}}>{(row.shiped == 1)?"Deactivate":"Activate"})
)}
) } }
